name: Trap Meister
description:
Created with a 64x64 resolution restriction, this game was originally intended for LowRezJam2021 but I ran out of time. I decided not to quit, however, and continue pushing through and releasing it. Enjoy!

Controls
  • Arrows: Move
  • Space Bar: Trap
Credits
  • Art/Development/Design: Clang
  • Music: Costco (Check out his Soundcloud!)
